title: Data mining and machine learning applications for analyzing the morality of Islamic bank credit card repayments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics, Understanding Financial Services, Fundamental Machine Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Analysis of regional moral factors and cultivation of practical application skills, focusing on the case of Islamic banks in Indonesia

learning_goals: Key moral variables influencing credit card repayment can be identified using data mining techniques (e.g., Boruta, Random Forest).
Regional repayment behavior patterns can be predicted using machine learning models (Logistic/XGBoost regression) and visualized with analytical tools.
Customized repayment management strategies for Islamic bank customers can be proposed based on analysis results, categorized by customer type.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
